response.original_title: MIKA NAKASHIMA GREATEST LIVE ~LIVE BEST SELECTION 2003~2017
response.overview: A must-see! The first live best video collection that includes selected live videos! Mika Nakashima's first tour, "MIKA NAKASHIMA FULL COURSE TOUR 2017~YOU WON'T LOSE~", which started at the end of last year, was a great success, and has received high praise both domestically and internationally for her overwhelming performance, which is better than ever. The best live video collection has finally been released! This work contains selected live videos from their debut in 2001 to the present and includes many songs such as "STARS", "WILL", "ORION", "GLAMOROUS SKY", "Hanaboutsu", etc. Contains hit songs. Recently, she has been actively holding live performances in a wide range of genres, and as she says, "I can finally enjoy this place, which is the most important place for me right now," and this work shows the change in her thoughts about singing.
response.title: MIKA NAKASHIMA GREATEST LIVE ~LIVE BEST SELECTION 2003~2017
